cats.name: Whiskers
cats.description: Whiskers is a playful and curious Siamese cat. She loves to play with toys and cuddle with her humans. She is already litter box trained and ready for her forever home.

cats.name: Oreo
cats.description: Oreo is a sweet and affectionate domestic short hair cat. He loves to be petted and will purr loudly to show his happiness. He is already litter box trained and up-to-date on his vaccinations.

cats.name: Luna
cats.description: Luna is a calm and gentle Persian cat. She enjoys napping in cozy places and being brushed to keep her beautiful coat looking its best. She is already spayed and ready to find her forever home.
